Computer security, also known as InfoSec, protects computers, networks, and sensitive data from digital threats, damage, or unauthorized access. It encompasses confidentiality, integrity, and availability (CIA triad), using measures like firewalls, encryption, strong passwords, software updates, and user education. Emerging threats include ransomware, phishing, and AI-based attacks, requiring continuous vigilance and adaptive security strategies.
